cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and shine in the day. What am I?

hints.text: ⬆️ I am up in the sky.

cosmos.question: I am round and white, and shine at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 Sometimes people say I look like cheese.
🐺 Werewolves like to howl at me.
😴 You see me when you are sleeping.

cosmos.question: I twinkle in the sky. I am very far away. What am I?
I am a big ball that you live on. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I have lots of green grass and trees.
💧 I have lots of blue water.

cosmos.question: I go around the Earth. I'm smaller than the Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🌚 I change my shape in the sky.
🌝 Sometimes I am a full circle.

cosmos.question: I'm hot and fiery and a very big star. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I give light to the Earth.
🌡️ You can get a sunburn from me.

cosmos.question: I am red and rocky, and a planet too. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 People sometimes call me the Red Planet.

cosmos.question: I am made of lots of stars and gas, like a big family. What am I?

hints.text: 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 I am a very, very big group.
✨ I contain many stars and planets

cosmos.question: I’m a big, cold planet made of gas. I have rings around me. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rock.
🪐 I am named after a Roman god.

cosmos.question: I am a hot burning ball in the sky so far away, bigger than Earth, but not as big as the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥  I may be red, white, blue or yellow.
🔭 You need to look to see me with a special tool.
✨  You are made of me like the Sun.

plant.question: I am green and grow outside. Birds sit in me. What am I?
I am red and round. You can eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White liked to eat me.

plant.question: I am yellow and long. Monkeys like to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 💛 You peel me before you eat me.

plant.question: I have pretty colors and smell nice. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 People give me as a gift.

plant.question: I am small and green. I grow in the ground and you can walk on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐾 You find me in the park.

plant.question: I'm a yummy orange vegetable that bunnies like to eat! What am I?
I am a big fruit with a green shell and pink inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🏖️ People like to eat me at the beach.

plant.question: I am a tall plant with a thick stem and kernels inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 You can make popcorn from me!

plant.question: I am a plant that grows underground. I can be mashed, fried, or baked! What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 You can make fries from me!
🌎 People all over the world eat me.

plant.question: I am a plant that climbs, with small round fruit that grow in bunches. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I'm often used to make juice.
🟣 I can be green, red, or purple.
